page.name: Assessment and Community Group
page.content:
To receive your Certificate of Completion, please complete a 5-question knowledge check. 

To continue learning about this topic please consider joining the Reading and Writing Community Group where you can share questions with your peers, participate in live events, and find additional resources.

As you know collaboration and community are essential for learning. Once you join the Community Group, please consider sharing your favorite resource from this module or a lesson you updated based on using the information from this module in the thread titled: Reflection: Making Reading & Writing Matter. 

If you are unsure about what to post, the Community Group moderator would love to hear from you and answer any questions you might have. 

Finally, please consider following @LINCS_ED on X (Twitter) for additional information, resources, and announcements.
